titleStmt.title: There is now in the press, a geographical discription of England, Scotland, and Ireland, with the isles thereto belonging: which in a compendious method treateth of such things that are most necessary to be known, and as yet hath not been treated of by any author ...
titleStmt.author: Blome, Richard, d. 1705.
